thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's HT Media March-Qtr Consol Profit Rises Almost Three-fold

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's HT Media March-Qtr Consol Profit Rises Almost Three-fold
text:
May 2 (Reuters) - HT Media Ltd:
* MARCH QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 750.4 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT 255.5 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* MARCH QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 5.61 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.85 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* SAYS RECOMMENDED DIVIDEND 0.40 RUPEES PER EQUITY SHARE * SAYS RAJIV VERMA DECIDED TO STEP DOWN AS CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER
* SAYS CO APPROVED AN INVESTMENT UPTO 100 MILLION RUPEES IN EDITORJI TECHNOLGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
* SAYS RECOMMENDED RE-APPOINTMENT OF SHOBHANA BHARTIA AS MD FOR A FURTHER PERIOD OF 5 YEARS
* SAYS RAJIV VERMA WILL CONTINUE IN HIS CURRENT ROLE TILL SUCCESSOR JOINS Source text - bit.ly/2rcLXvs Further company coverage:
